Interface CrudRepository<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity managed by this repository
ID - the type of the entity's identifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationRepository, CareerCenterStaffRepository, CompanyRepRepository, InternshipRepository, StudentRepository, WithdrawalRequestRepository
public interface CrudRepository<T,ID>
Minimal CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) repository contract used by in-memory repositories throughout the project.

This interface defines the basic persistence operations that all entity repositories should implement. It follows the repository pattern to abstract data access and provide a consistent API across different entity types.

Implementation Notes:

  • The save operation performs an upsert (insert or update)
  • findAll() should return entities in deterministic order when supported by the implementation
  • Implementations may throw NullPointerException for null parameters unless otherwise specified
  • This interface does not specify transaction behavior; implementations define their own guarantees

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<T> findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity to find; must not be null
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found entity, or empty if no entity exists with the given id
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the id is null

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Returns all entities managed by the repository.

      Implementations should return entities in a deterministic order when possible (e.g., insertion order, natural ordering, or sorted by identifier).

      Returns:
      a list of all entities; never null but may be empty

    • save

      T save(T entity)
      Saves (inserts or updates) an entity in the repository.

      This operation performs an upsert:

      • If the entity does not exist, it is inserted
      • If the entity already exists, it is updated
      The returned instance may be different from the input parameter (e.g., with generated identifiers or updated timestamps).
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to save; must not be null
      Returns:
      the saved entity; may be different from the input parameter
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the entity is null

    • saveAll

      List<T> saveAll(Iterable<T> entities)
      Saves all entities in the provided iterable.

      This is a batch operation that may be more efficient than multiple individual save calls for some implementations.

      Parameters:
      entities - the entities to save; must not be null and must not contain null elements
      Returns:
      a list of the saved entities in the same iteration order
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the iterable is null or contains null elements

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(ID id)
      Deletes the entity with the given identifier.

      If no entity exists with the given id, the method returns silently without error.

      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity to delete; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the id is null

    • deleteAllById

      void deleteAllById(Iterable<ID> ids)
      Deletes all entities with the given identifiers.

      If any identifier does not correspond to an existing entity, it is silently ignored. The operation continues processing remaining identifiers.

      Parameters:
      ids - the identifiers of entities to delete; must not be null and must not contain null elements
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the iterable is null or contains null elements

    • deleteAll

      void deleteAll()
      Deletes all entities managed by the repository.

      After this operation, the repository will be empty.

    • existsById

      boolean existsById(ID id)
      Checks whether an entity with the given identifier exists.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier to check; must not be null
      Returns:
      true if an entity with the given id exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the id is null

    • count

      long count()
      Returns the number of entities in the repository.
      Returns:
      the total count of entities
